    • Method Detail

      • provide

        public void provide(java.lang.String rpcName,
           RpcRequestedListener rpcRequestedListener)
        Registers a RpcRequestedListener as a RPC provider. If another connected client calls make(String, Object, RpcResponseCallback) the request will be routed to the supplied listener.
        Only one listener can be registered for a RPC at a time.
        Please note: Deepstream tries to deliver data in its original format. Data passed to make(String, Object, RpcResponseCallback) as a String will arrive as a String, numbers or implicitly JSON serialized objects will arrive in their respective format as well.
        Parameters:
        rpcName - The rpcName of the RPC to provide
        rpcRequestedListener - The listener to invoke when requests are recieved

      • unprovide

        public void unprovide(java.lang.String rpcName)
        Unregister a RpcRequestedListener registered via Rpcprovide(String, RpcRequestedListener)
        Parameters:
        rpcName - The rpcName of the RPC to stop providing

      • make

        public void make(java.lang.String rpcName,
        java.lang.Object data,
        RpcResponseCallback callback)
        Create a remote procedure call. This requires a rpc name for routing, a JSON serializable object for any associated arguments and a callback to notify you with the rpc result or potential error.
        Parameters:
        rpcName - The name of the rpc
        data - Serializable data that will be passed to the provider
        callback - Will be invoked with RpcResponseCallback.onRpcSuccess(String, Object) or RpcResponseCallback.onRpcError(String, Object)
